comments.body:
If we send the mean back as the main value to graph, this will introduce more noise into the benchmark - I believe `min` will be the most stable value. I really do want to reduce noise here, so that we can better identify regressions, and know when any performance work we do has a measurable effect.

Perhaps we can duplicate the graphs, and track median as well as min.
This patch will create graphs for all three (twelve, really).
